CLaRK_document_dtd.dtd: <!ELEMENT concordancequery (xpath,search,info?,multiple?)> <!ATTLIST concordancequery toolName CDATA #FIXED "Concordance" number (y|n) #IMPLIED source (y|n) #IMPLIED path (y|n) #IMPLIED special (y|n) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT document (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT element (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT ElValues (element,xpath)+> <!ELEMENT filter (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT folder (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT for (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT grammar (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT group (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST group recursive (y|n) #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT info (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT inputFiles (document*|group*)> <!ELEMENT key EMPTY> <!ATTLIST key expr CDATA #REQUIRED order (asc|desc) #IMPLIED trim (y|n) #IMPLIED normalize (y|n) #IMPLIED number (y|n) #IMPLIED reverse (y|n) #IMPLIED tokenizer CDATA #IMPLIED prefix (LC|I|RC|COM) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT left (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT mode EMPTY> <!ATTLIST mode type (new|overwrite) "overwrite" extension CDATA #IMPLIED save (y|n) #IMPLIED overwrite (y|n) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT multiple (folder,output,mode,inputFiles?,outputFiles?)> <!ELEMENT output EMPTY> <!ATTLIST output type (separate|united) "separate" ufn CDATA #IMPLIED dtdname CDATA #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT outputFiles (document*)> <!ELEMENT rgrammar (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT right (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT search ((textQuery,tokenizer?,filter?)|(grammar,ElValues?,tokenizer?,filter?)|(sgrammar,rgrammar?)|(for,left?,right?))> <!ATTLIST search type (grammar|xpath) #REQUIRED grMode (simplified|normal|queries) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT sgrammar (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT textQuery (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT tokenizer (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST tokenizer norm (yes|no) "no" > <!ELEMENT xpath (#PCDATA|key+)> <!ATTLIST xpath grammar_settings (true|false) #IMPLIED >
